mapper.select: SELECT t.createdDate, SUM(CASE WHEN t.LGN_SCS_YN = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS successCount, SUM(CASE WHEN t.LGN_SCS_YN = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS failureCount FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ENO, TO_CHAR(FST_ENT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createdDate, LGN_SCS_YN FROM THURXE_CLOGNL ) t GROUP BY t.createdDate ORDER BY t.createdDate

SELECT TO_CHAR(FST_ENT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createdDate, SUM(CASE WHEN LGN_SCS_YN = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS successCount, SUM(CASE WHEN LGN_SCS_YN = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS failureCount FROM THURXE_CLOGNL GROUP BY TO_CHAR(FST_ENT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY createdDate
SELECT TO_CHAR(FST_ENT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createdDate, COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM THURXE_CVIEWL GROUP BY TO_CHAR(FST_ENT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY createdDate
SELECT CER_KD_NM AS category, COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM THURXE_CLOGNL WHERE LGN_SCS_YN = '1' GROUP BY CER_KD_NM ORDER BY totalCount DESC
